General.Name: Acme Holdings Bhd
General.Description: ACME Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the housing and property development business in Malaysia and internationally. It operates through Manufacturing, Property Development, and Others segments. The company also manufactures and sells various plasticware products; and home and house ware products, such as kitchenware, toys, etc. In addition, it engages in the property letting business. The company is based in Georgetown, Malaysia.
